## Functions

### <a name="grub2_password"></a>`grub2_password`

Type: Ruby 4.x API

Generates GRUB 2 PBKDF2 hashes

#### `grub2_password(String $password, Optional[String] $salt, Optional[Integer] $rounds)`

The grub2_password function.

Returns: `String`

##### `password`

Data type: `String`

The password string to hash

##### `salt`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

A hash salt to use

##### `rounds`

Data type: `Optional[Integer]`

The number of rounds to use

  }]
